targets.expr: 100 * sum by (client_type) (nl2api_eval_batch_tests_passed_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode"}) / sum by (client_type) (nl2api_eval_batch_tests_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode"})

100 * sum by (client_version) (nl2api_eval_batch_tests_passed_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode"}) / sum by (client_version) (nl2api_eval_batch_tests_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode"})

100 * sum by (eval_mode) (nl2api_eval_batch_tests_passed_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode"}) / sum by (eval_mode) (nl2api_eval_batch_tests_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode"})

100 * sum(nl2api_eval_stage_passed_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode", stage="syntax"}) / (sum(nl2api_eval_stage_passed_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode", stage="syntax"}) + sum(nl2api_eval_stage_failed_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode", stage="syntax"}))

100 * sum(nl2api_eval_stage_passed_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode", stage="logic"}) / (sum(nl2api_eval_stage_passed_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode", stage="logic"}) + sum(nl2api_eval_stage_failed_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode", stage="logic"}))

100 * sum(nl2api_eval_stage_passed_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode", stage="execution"}) / (sum(nl2api_eval_stage_passed_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode", stage="execution"}) + sum(nl2api_eval_stage_failed_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode", stage="execution"}))

100 * sum(nl2api_eval_stage_passed_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode", stage="semantics"}) / (sum(nl2api_eval_stage_passed_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode", stage="semantics"}) + sum(nl2api_eval_stage_failed_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode", stage="semantics"}))

100 * sum by (stage) (nl2api_eval_stage_passed_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode"}) / (sum by (stage) (nl2api_eval_stage_passed_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode"}) + sum by (stage) (nl2api_eval_stage_failed_total{client_type=~"$client_type", client_version=~"$client_version", eval_mode=~"$eval_mode"}))
